141.heading: Myths.
141.title: "The Beast of Wolfton"
141.author: by Richard Corben
141.appears_in: p. 8-15 in Heavy Metal, v. 3, no. 10 (Feb. 1980).
notes: Begins: "In remote ancient lands north of Canisland there lay vast forests called the Direbak. The people that lived there shivered and hid in the gloomy dark. Their fears were founded in more than groundless myths. Here the unknown menace was substantial and hovered horribly just beyond perception's limits."
